amendatorysection.catchline: Refusal of witness to enter into recognizance or accept conditions; effect.
amendatorysection.para: If any witness required to enter into a recognizance or accept specified conditions for release under section 29-507 refuses to comply with such order, the court shall, subject to the conditions and procedure provided in section 29-508.01, commit him or her to jail until he or she complies with such order or is otherwise discharged according to law.
